channel.title: Very loud boom sound
channel.description:
My second post, try to be nice to me ;)
Here are some things you require .. A 2 Litre bottle , some dry ice and acess to room temperature water.
First to acquire the stuff. Go down to the supermarket, buy some dry ice and/or preferably a 2 litre water bottle. Do the below VERY quickly. If you bought a 2 litre water bottle, empty like 25 mls. Next smash the dry ice into the bottle so it can fit. REMEMBER TO SCREW THE LID ON (lol) :| Throw somewhere and gap the scenes. If you didnt buy a 2 litre water bottle, a soda bottle and warm water will do fine.
I have tried this several times and it worked. Me and a friend were experimenting with some stuff and created this.
[font=Verdana]DISCLAIMER[/font] I am not responsible for any outcomes/consequences you may face during this prank/task.
